segments.text: This is so sad to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is completely disconnected from what’s happening around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring out, and she doesn’t even notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are taking cookies, and she’s missing the whole thing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It feels like she’s lost in her own thoughts, unable to see the chaos unfolding.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is risking falling, and she’s not there to stop him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting, hoping for a cookie, but no one is guiding her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish she would just turn around and see what’s happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene feels so lonely and disconnected.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she snaps out of it soon.
segments.speaker: PAR
